DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a modified version of the Sleep Enhancement Fatigue Reduction Training (SEFRT) system can improve sleep and health-related symptoms and quality of life in experienced shift-working nurses.
DOC.brief_title: Sleep Enhancement Training Study for Experienced Shiftworkers
